Author: Regnar#6164
Content:
Okay but lets be real here, there WAS a date set in some of Komodo communications (those communications are cited in links here). That date was set prematurely in early 2018, we failed to update people that there was going to be delays, delays for good reason or not, now we are here with rebrand still in planning/implementation. Rebranding is obviously going to take time since it isn't just changing a website, it's about changing how we are perceived and who our target market is. 
There is no point in arguing whether we set a date or not, we did. it's cited. What we should be discussing is what do we do next, or while the rebrand is happening
